Question: Aiper Intelligent, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aiper Intelligent, LLC

Horizon U1 Robotic Lawn Mower

- Cordless and compact design for yards up to 32,000 sq. ft.
- Wireless mowing capabilities with adaptive blade technology
- Boundary setting via app without the need for inground boundary wires
- Precision mowing with Intelligent Path Planning technology
- Maneuverability around obstacles using Aiper Vision Technology
- Autonomous battery monitor and intelligent recharging system
- First-ever app for iOS and Android for remote control
- Unveiled at CES 2024, available for purchase in Q3 2024 on Aiper.com
